title: Secret Flight
original_name: シークレット フライト
sinopse:
Flight Attendant Yuzuru is set to take flight with Pilot Shiyou, a man he idolizes. What will happen when Shiyou approaches him and invites him to have an affair?

In Japan Oriental Airlines, a flight company for the elites, many romances are about to bloom!

(Source: Blissful Sin)
